verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses בֹּ֖א <S%H935><s%> Go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פַּרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> in unto Pharaoh כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנִ֞י <S%H589><s%> I הִכְבַּ֤דְתִּי <S%H3513><s%> for I have hardened אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לִבּוֹ֙ <S%H3820><s%> his heart וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> and the heart עֲבָדָ֔יו <S%H5650><s%> of his servants לְמַ֗עַן <S%H4616><s%> because of שִׁתִ֛י <S%H7896><s%> that I might shew אֹתֹתַ֥י <S%H226><s%> these my signs אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these בְּקִרְבּֽוֹ׃ <S%H7130><s%> before

וּלְמַ֡עַן <S%H4616><s%> because of תְּסַפֵּר֩ <S%H5608><s%> And that thou mayest tell בְּאָזְנֵ֨י <S%H241><s%> in the ears בִנְךָ֜ <S%H1121><s%> of thy son וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> and of thy son's בִּנְךָ֗ <S%H1121><s%> son אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> and how הִתְעַלַּ֙לְתִּי֙ <S%H5953><s%> what things I have wrought בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> in Egypt וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֹתֹתַ֖י <S%H226><s%> and my signs אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> and how שַׂ֣מְתִּי <S%H7760><s%> which I have done בָ֑ם וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3045><s%> among them that ye may know כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> how that I [am] the LORD

וַיָּבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> came in מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses וְאַהֲרֹן֮ <S%H175><s%> and Aaron אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פַּרְעֹה֒ <S%H6547><s%> unto Pharaoh וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> unto him Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God הָֽעִבְרִ֔ים <S%H5680><s%> of the Hebrews עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against מָתַ֣י <S%H4970><s%> How long מֵאַ֔נְתָּ <S%H3985><s%> wilt thou refuse לֵעָנֹ֖ת <S%H6031><s%> to humble מִפָּנָ֑י <S%H6440><s%> thyself before שַׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> go עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> me? let my people וְיַֽעַבְדֻֽנִי׃ <S%H5647><s%> that they may serve

כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> Else אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if מָאֵ֥ן <S%H3986><s%> if thou refuse אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you לְשַׁלֵּ֣חַ <S%H7971><s%> go אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּ֑י <S%H5971><s%> to let my people הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> behold מֵבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> will I bring מָחָ֛ר <S%H4279><s%> behold to morrow אַרְבֶּ֖ה <S%H697><s%> the locusts בִּגְבֻלֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1366><s%> into thy coast

וְכִסָּה֙ <S%H3680><s%> And they shall cover אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵ֣ין <S%H5869><s%> the face הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no יוּכַ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> that one cannot be able לִרְאֹ֣ת <S%H7200><s%> to see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth וְאָכַ֣ל ׀ <S%H398><s%> and they shall eat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יֶ֣תֶר <S%H3499><s%> the residue הַפְּלֵטָ֗ה <S%H6413><s%> of that which is escaped הַנִּשְׁאֶ֤רֶת <S%H7604><s%> which remaineth לָכֶם֙ מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַבָּרָ֔ד <S%H1259><s%> unto you from the hail וְאָכַל֙ <S%H398><s%> and shall eat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every הָעֵ֔ץ <S%H6086><s%> every tree הַצֹּמֵ֥חַ <S%H6779><s%> which groweth לָכֶ֖ם מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> out הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <S%H7704><s%> for you out of the field

וּמָלְא֨וּ <S%H4390><s%> And they shall fill בָתֶּ֜יךָ <S%H1004><s%> thy houses וּבָתֵּ֣י <S%H1004><s%> and the houses כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all עֲבָדֶיךָ֮ <S%H5650><s%> of all thy servants וּבָתֵּ֣י <S%H1004><s%> and the houses כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all מִצְרַיִם֒ <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> neither רָא֤וּ <S%H7200><s%> have seen אֲבֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1><s%> which neither thy fathers וַאֲב֣וֹת <S%H1><s%> nor thy fathers' אֲבֹתֶ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> fathers מִיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> since the day הֱיוֹתָם֙ <S%H1961><s%> came עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> that they were upon the earth עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> until הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וַיִּ֥פֶן <S%H6437><s%> And he turned וַיֵּצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> himself and went out מֵעִ֥ם <S%H5973><s%> from פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> from Pharaoh

וַיֹּאמְרוּ֩ <S%H559><s%> said עַבְדֵ֨י <S%H5650><s%> servants פַרְעֹ֜ה <S%H6547><s%> And Pharaoh's אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> about עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> to him מָתַי֙ <S%H4970><s%> How יִהְיֶ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> will this לָ֙נוּ֙ לְמוֹקֵ֔שׁ <S%H4170><s%> unto him How long shall this man be a snare שַׁלַּח֙ <S%H7971><s%> go אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> the men וְיַֽעַבְד֖וּ <S%H5647><s%> that they may serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> their God הֲטֶ֣רֶם <S%H2962><s%> thou not yet תֵּדַ֔ע <S%H3045><s%> knowest כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אָבְדָ֖ה <S%H6><s%> is destroyed מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> that Egypt

וַיּוּשַׁ֞ב <S%H7725><s%> were brought again אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֤ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> and Aaron אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> unto Pharaoh וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to לְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> [but] who [are] they that shall go עִבְד֖וּ <S%H5647><s%> serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> your God מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> Who וָמִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> Who הַהֹלְכִֽים׃ <S%H1980><s%> Go

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses בִּנְעָרֵ֥ינוּ <S%H5288><s%> with our young וּבִזְקֵנֵ֖ינוּ <S%H2205><s%> and with our old נֵלֵ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> shall go בְּבָנֵ֨ינוּ <S%H1121><s%> with our sons וּבִבְנוֹתֵ֜נוּ <S%H1323><s%> and with our daughters בְּצֹאנֵ֤נוּ <S%H6629><s%> with our flocks וּבִבְקָרֵ֙נוּ֙ <S%H1241><s%> and with our herds נֵלֵ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> shall go כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for חַג־ <S%H2282><s%> for we [must hold] a feast יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD לָֽנוּ׃

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> about יְהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> to them כֵ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> Thus יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> unto them Let the LORD עִמָּכֶ֔ם <S%H5973><s%> you כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> if אֲשַׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> be so with you as I will let you go אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> טַפְּכֶ֑ם <S%H2945><s%> and your little ones רְא֕וּ <S%H7200><s%> look כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for רָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> [to it] for evil נֶ֥גֶד <S%H5048><s%> is in פְּנֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> [is] before

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Not כֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> so לְכֽוּ־ <S%H1980><s%> Go נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> now הַגְּבָרִים֙ <S%H1397><s%> now ye [that are] men וְעִבְד֣וּ <S%H5647><s%> and serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you מְבַקְשִׁ֑ים <S%H1245><s%> for that ye did desire וַיְגָ֣רֶשׁ <S%H1644><s%> And they were driven out אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> מֵאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> presence פַרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> from Pharaoh's פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses נְטֵ֨ה <S%H5186><s%> Stretch out יָדְךָ֜ <S%H3027><s%> thine hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over אֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> over the land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt בָּֽאַרְבֶּ֔ה <S%H697><s%> for the locusts וְיַ֖עַל <S%H5927><s%> that they may come up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְיֹאכַל֙ <S%H398><s%> and eat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every עֵ֣שֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> every herb הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after הִשְׁאִ֖יר <S%H7604><s%> hath left הַבָּרָֽד׃ <S%H1259><s%> [even] all that the hail

וַיֵּ֨ט <S%H5186><s%> stretched forth מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַטֵּהוּ֮ <S%H4294><s%> his rod עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> over the land מִצְרַיִם֒ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וַֽיהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD נִהַ֤ג <S%H5090><s%> brought ר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> wind קָדִים֙ <S%H6921><s%> an east בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the land כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> all that day הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַלָּ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> and all [that] night הַבֹּ֣קֶר <S%H1242><s%> [and] when it was morning הָיָ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> become וְר֙וּחַ֙ <S%H7307><s%> wind הַקָּדִ֔ים <S%H6921><s%> the east נָשָׂ֖א <S%H5375><s%> brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאַרְבֶּֽה׃ <S%H697><s%> the locusts

וַיַּ֣עַל <S%H5927><s%> went up הָֽאַרְבֶּ֗ה <S%H697><s%> And the locusts עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> over all the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וַיָּ֕נַח <S%H5117><s%> and rested בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> in all the coasts מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt כָּבֵ֣ד <S%H3515><s%> grievous מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> very לְ֠פָנָיו <S%H6440><s%> [were they] before לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> had never הָ֨יָה <S%H1961><s%> been כֵ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> them there were no such אַרְבֶּה֙ <S%H697><s%> locusts כָּמֹ֔הוּ <S%H3644><s%> according to וְאַחֲרָ֖יו <S%H310><s%> as they neither after לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> been כֵּֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> there be so

וַיְכַ֞ס <S%H3680><s%> For they covered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵ֣ין <S%H5869><s%> the face כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of the whole הָאָרֶץ֮ <S%H776><s%> of the whole earth וַתֶּחְשַׁ֣ךְ <S%H2821><s%> was darkened הָאָרֶץ֒ <S%H776><s%> so that the land וַיֹּ֜אכַל <S%H398><s%> and they did eat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every עֵ֣שֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> every herb הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all פְּרִ֣י <S%H6529><s%> and all the fruit הָעֵ֔ץ <S%H6086><s%> of the trees אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after הוֹתִ֖יר <S%H3498><s%> had left הַבָּרָ֑ד <S%H1259><s%> which the hail וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not נוֹתַ֨ר <S%H3498><s%> and there remained כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יֶ֧רֶק <S%H3418><s%> not any green thing בָּעֵ֛ץ <S%H6086><s%> in the trees וּבְעֵ֥שֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> or in the herbs הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> through all the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וַיְמַהֵ֣ר <S%H4116><s%> in haste פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> Then Pharaoh לִקְרֹ֖א <S%H7121><s%> called לְמֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> for Moses וּֽלְאַהֲרֹ֑ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he said חָטָ֛אתִי <S%H2398><s%> I have sinned לַיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> your God וְלָכֶֽם׃

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now שָׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> Now therefore forgive נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> please חַטָּאתִי֙ <S%H2403><s%> I pray thee my sin אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> only הַפַּ֔עַם <S%H6471><s%> only this once וְהַעְתִּ֖ירוּ <S%H6279><s%> and intreat לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> your God וְיָסֵר֙ <S%H5493><s%> that he may take away מֵֽעָלַ֔י <S%H5921><s%> and רַ֖ק <S%H7535><s%> but אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמָּ֥וֶת <S%H4194><s%> from me this death הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this
וַיֵּצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> And he went out מֵעִ֣ם <S%H5973><s%> from פַּרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> from Pharaoh וַיֶּעְתַּ֖ר <S%H6279><s%> and intreated אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> you תִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> Thou must give בְּיָדֵ֖נוּ <S%H3027><s%> us זְבָחִ֣ים <S%H2077><s%> also sacrifices וְעֹל֑וֹת <S%H5930><s%> and burnt offerings וְעָשִׂ֖ינוּ <S%H6213><s%> that we may sacrifice לַיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> our God
